name: bs-club-mngr
description: A library that helps to gain more Club organization.

scripts.build: rm -rf dist shell.json cypress.env.json && sh src/commons/scripts/create-cypress-env.sh && npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/login.spec.cy.js' --headless && sh src/commons/scripts/create-json-files.sh && tsc && copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.txt src/**/*.json dist

author: msscash
